original_title: The Ultimate Fighter China Finale: Kim vs. Hathaway
overview: The Ultimate Fighter China Finale: Kim vs. Hathaway was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship. The event took place on March 1, 2014, at the CotaiArena in Macau, SAR, China. The event was headlined by a welterweight bout between John Hathaway and Dong Hyun Kim.
title: The Ultimate Fighter China Finale: Kim vs. Hathaway
